'''Gretchen''' is a widow who attended the same grief group as [[Teddy Altman]] after the death of her husband.

==History==
While attending the same grief group as Teddy, Gretchen started to describe the sudden death of her husband, Jason. The way she described it caused Teddy to burst out laughing and tell Gretchen exactly what happened to her husband's heart.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She was married to a man named Jason until his death.
